meanings: (휴식을 취하다) rest, relax, have[take] a rest, take a break, take time off, (informal) kick back
(일을) be out of work,; (휴가를 얻어서) take (a day) off; (일자리가 없어서) be unemployed, be in between jobs

meanings.meaning: keep your nose to the grindstone
talk, etc. nineteen to the dozen

examples.korean: non-stop entertainment / work 발음듣기 쉬지 않고 계속되는 오락[여흥]/일 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
The rain fell without pause. 발음듣기 비는 쉬지 않고 내렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The rain fell without pause. 발음

examples.korean: He worked on without a break. 발음듣기 그는 쉬지 않고 계속 일을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He worked on without a break. 발음

examples.korean: She worked all day without a break. 발음듣기 그녀는 하루 종일 쉬지 않고 일했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She worked all day without a break. 발음

examples.korean: incessant noise / rain / chatter 발음듣기 끊임없는 소음/쉬지 않고 내리는 비/쉴새없는 수다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
